description: Lich Inhabitant - A Tier 2 undead spellcaster with Scholarly (+40% Research), Undead Master, Fearless, and Ancient Knowledge traits, plus special room interactions for Throne Room, Soul Well, and Library.

userStories.title: Define Lich YAML data with stats and traits
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Lich defined in YAML gamedata with complete stats, traits, and room interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: Lich entry in gamedata/inhabitants/ YAML with: id, name, description, sprite reference, tier 2
Stats: HP (medium), Attack (high magic), Defense (low physical), Speed (low)
Traits: Scholarly (researchBonus: 0.4), Undead Master, Fearless, Ancient Knowledge
Scared behavior: unreachable due to Fearless (documented as Arcane Shield)
Hungry behavior: drains life force from nearby living inhabitants
Special room interactions: Throne Room (+10% dungeon-wide Research), Soul Well (double Soul Essence), Library (+20% additional Research)
At least 2 fusion recipes involving the Lich defined
npm run gamedata:build compiles without errors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement Lich trait effects and room bonuses
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Lich traits to apply their gameplay effects when assigned to rooms.
acceptanceCriteria: Scholarly trait: +40% Research output when assigned to research-producing rooms, stacks additively with other modifiers
Undead Master: undead inhabitants in same or adjacent rooms gain +1 Attack and +1 Defense, recalculated on assignment changes
Fearless: Lich never enters Scared state
Ancient Knowledge: having a Lich reveals one hidden research node per branch in the research tree
Throne Room assignment provides dungeon-wide +10% Research
Soul Well assignment doubles Soul Essence generation
Library assignment grants +20% additional Research (total +60% with Scholarly)
Effects use computed() signals that recalculate on assignment changes
Typecheck passes
